Text: EOG RESOURCES REPORTS OVER SEVEN PERCENT INCREASE IN US NATURAL GAS PRODUCTION AND RECORD FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME AVAILABLE TO COMMON OF MILLION OR PER SHARECroy Marketing Representative EOG Resources Inc P O Box Houston Texas Ph Cell Fax Fax Forwarded by Steve CroyEOGResources on AM Investor Relations To EveryoneEOGR Everyone OES Houston cc Subject EOG RESOURCES REPORTS OVER SEVEN PERCENT INCREASE AM IN US NATURAL GAS PRODUCTION AND RECORD FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME AVAILABLE TO COMMON OF MILLION OR PER SHARE FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Monday April HOUSTON EOG Resources Inc EOG an SP Index company today reported record first quarter net income available to common of million or per share compared to net income available to common of million or per share in the first quarter a year ago At a time when the industry as a whole is struggling to maintain flat gas production EOG increased US natural gas production by over seven percent This demonstrates our ability to continue to grow our production organically said Mark G Papa chairman and chief executive officer Our operations and drilling inventory are in the best shape ever we are off to a great start in Versus the same quarter a year ago EOGs North American daily natural gas production increased percent crude and condensate production increased percent and natural gas liquids production decreased percent This resulted in overall EOG North American production growth of approximately four percent consistent with the full year target Based on shares outstanding production per share increased approximately five percent in North America EOG has significantly ramped up its North American activity Papa noted Over the last year our acreage position including trades has increased over percent our geological and geophysical headcount has grown by over percent and EOG currently has percent more rigs drilling than this time last year To position EOG for the future North American capital expenditures increased during the first quarter to million compared to million in the first quarter Results from the quarter further solidify EOGs focus on organic growth and its longterm financial strategy EOG continued to strengthen its financial structure with the following Reduced the number of common shares outstanding by approximately to million Paid down million of debt reducing the debt to total capitalization ratio from percent at year end to percent at the end of the first quarter and Increased the annual common dividend by percent from to per share EOGs first quarter conference call will be available via live audio webcast at am Central Time am Eastern Time on Monday April To listen to this webcast log on to wwweogresourcescom The webcast will be archived on EOGs website for days EOG Resources Inc is one of the largest independent nonintegrated oil and gas companies in the United States and is the operator of substantial proved reserves in the US Canada and offshore Trinidad EOG Resources Inc is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and is traded under the ticker symbol EOG This press release includes forward looking statements within the meaning of Section A of the Securities Act of and Section E of the Securities Exchange Act of Although EOG believes that its expectations are based on reasonable assumptions it can give no assurance that such expectations will be achieved Important factors that could cause actual results to differ materially from those in the forward looking statements herein include but are not limited to the timing and extent of changes in reserve quantities and commodity prices for crude oil natural gas and related products and interest rates the extent of EOGs success in discovering developing producing and marketing reserves and in acquiring oil and gas properties uncertainties and changes associated with international projects and operations including reserve estimates markets contract terms construction financing availability operating costs and political developments around the world and conditions of the capital and equity markets during the periods covered by the forward looking statements See attached file Earnings of doc See attached file Earnings of xls Earnings of doc Earnings of xls
